trans-unit.source: Presents a user interface for designing components.
trans-unit.target: Viser et brukergrensesnitt for utforming komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurface class implements what the user perceives as a designer.
trans-unit.target: DesignSurface klassen implementerer brukeren perceives som designer.

trans-unit.source: DesignSurface is the user interface the user manipulates to change design-time features.
trans-unit.target: DesignSurface er brukergrensesnittet brukeren redigerer Hvis du vil endre utformingen funksjoner.

trans-unit.source: DesignSurface provides a completely self-contained design surface.
trans-unit.target: DesignSurface gir en fullstendig uavhengig utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurface class may be used as a stand-alone designer, or it may be coupled with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> class to provide a common implementation for an application that hosts multiple DesignSurface objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurface kan brukes som en frittstående designer, eller den kan være sammen med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>klassen for å angi en vanlig implementering for en applikasjon som er vert for flere DesignSurface-objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurface class can be used by itself, or the user can derive a new class from it and augment the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurface kan brukes av seg selv, eller brukeren kan avledes en ny klasse fra den og utvide virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurface class provides several design-time services automatically.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurface inneholder flere utformingen automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurface class adds all of its services in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurface legger til alle tjenestene i sin konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: Most of these services can be overridden by replacing them in the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: De fleste av disse tjenestene kan overstyres ved å erstatte dem i det beskyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil erstatte en tjeneste, overstyre konstruktøren kall base og gjøre endringer i det beskyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: All services that are added to the service container and that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> are disposed when the design surface is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Alle tjenester som legges til i beholderen og implementerer <xref:System.IDisposable>fjernet når utformingsoverflaten er fjernet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The default set of replaceable services that the DesignSurface class provides is shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Standardsettet med kan erstattes services som inneholder klassen DesignSurface vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Service|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderProviderService>|Enables objects that are not part of the container’s components collection to provide their own extender providers.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderListService>|Used by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to get a list of extender providers.
trans-unit.target: | Tjenesten | Beskrivelse | |-------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderProviderService>| Gjør det mulig for objekter som ikke er en del av beholderen komponenter samlingselement angi sitt eget extender-leverandører. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderListService>| Bruk av <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>å hente en liste over leverandører extender.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderListService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IExtenderProviderService>

trans-unit.source: With this service, extender providers can live outside of the container.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>|Provides designer metadata hooks.
trans-unit.target: Med denne tjenesten extender leverandører kan live utenfor beholderen. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>| Gir designer metadata bindinger.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>

trans-unit.source: This is the primary interface for metadata filtering.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>|Provides a way to select components in the designer.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>|Provides a way to get a name for objects, even when those objects are not sited.| |DesignSurface|Offers the design surface itself as a service.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService>|Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.| The following table shows the non-replaceable services provided by default.
trans-unit.target: Dette er det primære grensesnittet for metadata filtrering. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>| Gjør det mulig å installere komponentene i utformeren. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService>| Gjør det mulig å få et navn på objekter, selv om disse objektene ikke er plassert. | | DesignSurface | Tilbyr utformingsoverflaten seg selv som en tjeneste. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService>| Inneholder en basisklasse for henting og angivelse av verdiene for en designer. | Tabellen nedenfor viser ikke kan erstattes tjenestene som standard.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>

trans-unit.source: |Service|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>|Raises events as changes are made to components.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>|Controls access to types, services, and transactions.
trans-unit.target: | Tjenesten | Beskrivelse | |-------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>| Opphøyer hendelser som endres komponenter. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>| Kontrollerer tilgang til typer, tjenester og transaksjoner.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Master interface for designers.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>|Owns the set of components that are being designed.
trans-unit.target: Master grensesnitt for utviklere. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>| Eier sett med komponenter som er blir utformet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: Each designer has an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> that owns the components.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>|Derives from <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and provides a way to add and remove services from the designer.| In addition to these services, the DesignSurface class also provides a single service that is available through a component’s site.
trans-unit.target: Hver designer har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>som eier komponentene. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>| Er avledet fra <xref:System.IServiceProvider>og gjør det mulig å legge til og fjerne services fra utformeren. | I tillegg til disse tjenestene klassen DesignSurface gir deg også en tjeneste som er tilgjengelig via en komponent området.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: This service is unique for each component.
trans-unit.target: Denne tjenesten er unik for hver komponent.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the services that cannot be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tjenestene som ikke kan erstattes.

trans-unit.source: |Service|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>|A generic dictionary of key/value pairs that can be used to store arbitrary data about a component.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.INestedContainer>|A container that enables a component to add additional child components to the designer.
trans-unit.target: | Tjenesten | Beskrivelse | |-------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>| En generell ordliste for nøkkel/verdi-parene som kan brukes til å lagre tilfeldig data om en komponent. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.INestedContainer>| En beholder som gjør det mulig for en komponent for å legge til flere underordnede komponenter i utformeren.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INestedContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>

trans-unit.source: These components will be part of the design surface, but will not participate in serialization.
trans-unit.target: Disse komponentene vil være del av utformingsoverflaten, men vil ikke delta i programmet for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to design a control that is capable of exposing a region of itself in a designer, but you do not want the region to participate in serialization.| In addition to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, the site also implements the following interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du ønsker å utforme en kontroll som kan eksponere et område for seg selv i en designer, men du ikke vil område til å delta i serialisering. | I tillegg til <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, området implementerer også følgende grensesnitt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Check for the existence of these interfaces, rather than use indiscriminate casting, because other site implementations may not implement them.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollere om finnes for disse grensesnitt i stedet for Bruk indiscriminate endring, fordi det andre området implementeringer ikke kan gjennomføre dem.

trans-unit.source: |Service|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>|Provides a way to get to the container of site-specific services.
trans-unit.target: | Tjenesten | Beskrivelse | |-------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>| Gjør det mulig å gå til beholderen av bare services.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService> is a site-specific service.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>er en tjeneste som er spesifikk for et område.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>

trans-unit.source: With this service, you can add additional site-specific services.|
trans-unit.target: Denne tjenesten, kan du legge til bare tilleggstjenester. |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When `parentProvide` is present, designers contained within the surface can retrieve services from the application.
trans-unit.target: Når `parentProvide` er til stede, utviklere innenfor overflaten kan hente services fra programmet.

trans-unit.source: The parent service provider, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no parent used to resolve services.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av overordnede, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen overordnede brukes til å løse services.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you use the DesignSurface constructor, it creates a simple designer loader that, in turn, creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker DesignSurface-konstruktøren, opprettes det en enkel designer laster som oppretter en komponent i den angitte typen igjen, og slutter innlasting av prosessen.

trans-unit.source: This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en enkel måte å opprette en designer under forutsetning alle utføres lagring av tilstanden eksternt.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> and passes the root component type.
trans-unit.target: Dette kaller internt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>og sender komponenttypen roten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DesignSurface overload is not affected by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DesignSurface overbelastning påvirkes ikke av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions> must be in the service container before the design surface loads.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>må være i beholderen før du laster inn utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>

trans-unit.source: If you need access to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>, call the empty constructor, add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A> and call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> with `rootComponentType`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>, kalle tom konstruktøren, legge til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A>og kall <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>med `rootComponentType`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ServiceContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DesignerOptions>

trans-unit.source: The type of root component to create.
trans-unit.target: Dokumenttypen roten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: rootComponent is .
trans-unit.target: rootComponentis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Using the DesignSurface constructor creates a simple designer loader that creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av DesignSurface konstruktøren oppretter en enkel designer laster som oppretter en komponent i den angitte typen og slutter innlasting av prosessen.

trans-unit.source: This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en enkel måte å opprette en designer under forutsetning alle utføres lagring av tilstanden eksternt.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> and passes the root component type.
trans-unit.target: Dette kaller internt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>og sender komponenttypen roten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent service provider, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no parent used to resolve services.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av overordnede, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det er ingen overordnede brukes til å løse services.

trans-unit.source: The type of root component to create.
trans-unit.target: Dokumenttypen roten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: rootComponent is .
trans-unit.target: rootComponentis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Begins the loading process with the given designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Starter innlasting av prosessen med den angitte designer lasteren.

trans-unit.source: Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer innlasting kan være asynkron, slik at innlasting kan fortsette å fortsette etter at denne samtalen har returnert.

trans-unit.source: Attach an event handler to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Koble en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>hendelsen som skal varsles når utformingsoverflaten innlastingen er fullført.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>er kalt, kan du umiddelbart få visningen for designeren fordi designer Lasterne må angi minst root-komponenten under innlasting av asynkron.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer loader to use for loading the designer.
trans-unit.target: Designer-laster skal brukes til å laste inn designer.

trans-unit.source: loader is .
trans-unit.target: loaderis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Begins the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Starter innlasting av prosessen.

trans-unit.source: When `rootComponentType` is specified, a default designer loader that simply creates an instance of `rootComponentType` will be used.
trans-unit.target: Når `rootComponentType` er angitt, en standard designer laster som bare oppretter en forekomst av `rootComponentType` vil bli brukt.

trans-unit.source: Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer innlasting kan være asynkron, slik at innlasting kan fortsette å fortsette etter at denne samtalen har returnert.

trans-unit.source: Attach an event handler to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Koble en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>hendelsen som skal varsles når utformingsoverflaten innlastingen er fullført.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>

trans-unit.source: After BeginLoad is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Når BeginLoad kalles, kan du umiddelbart få visningen for designeren fordi designer Lasterne må angi minst root-komponenten under innlasting av asynkront.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The BeginLoad method creates an instance of the component type and initializes a designer for this instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For BeginLoad metoden oppretter en forekomst av komponenttypen og initialiserer en utformer for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded> event is raised before this method returns.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded>hendelsen starter før denne metoden returnerer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded>

trans-unit.source: The type of component to create in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Typen for komponenten til å opprette i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: rootComponentType is .
trans-unit.target: rootComponentTypeis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> implementation within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> implementering i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The ComponentContainer property holds all objects that are currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ComponentContainer inneholder alle objekter som finnes i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: When components are added to ComponentContainer, their designer, if any, is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Når komponenter legges til ComponentContainer, er deres designer lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: The component is sited with a site that provides full access to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten er plassert med et område som gir full tilgang til utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> implementation within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> implementering i utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponent method is called by the design surface’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateComponent%2A> method to create an instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateComponent kalles av utformingsoverflaten <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateComponent%2A>metode for å opprette en forekomst av en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.CreateComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The component should be created and added to the public container on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten må opprettes og legges til i felles beholderen på utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The type of component to create.
trans-unit.target: Typen for komponenten til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The newly created component.
trans-unit.target: Den nyopprettede komponenten.

trans-unit.source: componentType is .
trans-unit.target: componentTypeis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a designer when a component is added to the container.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en designer når en komponent er lagt til i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesigner method is called by the design surface’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> when a component is added to the container.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDesigner kalles av utformingsoverflaten <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>når en komponent er lagt til i beholderen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: This method creates a designer, but does not initialize it.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter en designer, men initialisere ikke den.

trans-unit.source: When it returns, the designer is initialized by the container.
trans-unit.target: Når den returnerer er designeren initialisert av beholderen.

trans-unit.source: CreateDesigner can create two different types of designers: root designers and normal designers.
trans-unit.target: CreateDesigner kan opprette to forskjellige typer utviklere: utviklere og normal utviklere for rotmappen.

trans-unit.source: A root designer is a designer for the root component in the design surface, which by definition is the first component added to the container.
trans-unit.target: En Rotdesigner er en utformer for komponenten roten i utformingsoverflaten, noe som som standard er den første komponenten legges til i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Root designers differ from normal designers because they are responsible for the user interface presented to the end user.
trans-unit.target: Root utviklere være forskjellig fra normal utviklere fordi de er ansvarlig for brukergrensesnitt vises sluttbrukeren.

trans-unit.source: Root designers typically coordinate with the rest of the designers on a design surface to provide this interface.
trans-unit.target: Root utviklere koordinat vanligvis med resten av utviklere på en utformingsoverflaten angi dette grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method delegates to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>, passing in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> as the designer type for root designers, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> for normal designers.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne metoden delegerer til <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>, og passere i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>som designer-type for roten utviklere eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>for normal utviklere.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to request a specific type of designer.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne metoden for å be om en bestemt type designer.

trans-unit.source: The component for which the designer should be created.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som designer må opprettes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a root designer; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to create a normal designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>opprette en rot utformer; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til å opprette en vanlig designer.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested designer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no matching designer could be found.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den forespurte utformeren eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis finner ingen samsvarende designer.

trans-unit.source: component is .
trans-unit.target: componentis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the given type.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: If `type` is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, CreateInstance searches for a constructor of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> first, followed by an empty constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `type` er en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, CreateInstance søker etter en konstruktør av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>først, etterfulgt av en tom konstruktør.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The type to create.
trans-unit.target: Typen til å opprette.

trans-unit.source: The newly created object.
trans-unit.target: Det nyopprettede objektet.

trans-unit.source: type is .
trans-unit.target: typeis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a container suitable for nesting controls or components.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en beholder som passer for nesting kontroller eller komponenter.

trans-unit.source: Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en komponent i en nestet beholder oppretter designer og gjør den berettiget til alle tjenester tilgjengelig fra utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.
trans-unit.target: Komponenter som er lagt til nestede beholdere ikke delta i programmet for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: The component that manages the nested container.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som administrerer nestede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The nested container.
trans-unit.target: Den nestede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: owningComponent is .
trans-unit.target: owningComponentis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a container suitable for nesting controls or components.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en beholder som passer for nesting kontroller eller komponenter.

trans-unit.source: Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Legge til en komponent i en nestet beholder oppretter designer og gjør den berettiget til alle tjenester tilgjengelig fra utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.
trans-unit.target: Komponenter som er lagt til nestede beholdere ikke delta i programmet for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: You can provide an additional name for the CreateNestedContainer method by passing a value into `containerName`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en ekstra navn for metoden CreateNestedContainer ved å sende en verdi til `containerName`.

trans-unit.source: The component that manages the nested container.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som administrerer nestede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: An additional name for the nested container.
trans-unit.target: En ekstra navn for den nestede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The nested container.
trans-unit.target: Den nestede beholderen.

trans-unit.source: owningComponent is .
trans-unit.target: owningComponentis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Offentlig fjerningsmetoden følger standarden <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden ødelegger utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede versjonen av denne metoden er `virtual` og følger normal <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>ikke har noen opprinnelig kode til å rydde opp, den ikke har en sluttbehandler som kaller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>, du må legge til en sluttbehandler.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>ble bruker.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Offentligheten <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose>metoden følger standarden <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden ødelegger utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede versjonen av denne metoden er `virtual` og følger normal <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls Dispose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>ikke har noen opprinnelig kode til å rydde opp, den ikke har en sluttbehandler som kaller avhending.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call Dispose, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å kalle avhending, må du legge en sluttbehandler selv.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the design surface is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når utformingsoverflaten er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The surface is only disposed when the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%2A> method on <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> is called.
trans-unit.target: Overflaten er bare fjernet når offentligheten <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%2A>-metoden på <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>kalles.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the **Design-time Error List** is loading.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den **utformingen feillisten** lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Design-time Error List** is loading; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den **utformingen feillisten** er lasting; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Serializes changes to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Serializes endringer til utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The Flush method can be called to push changes made to the design surface down to the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Tømming-metoden kan bare kalles til å lede endringer til utformingsoverflaten ned serialiseringen.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the design surface and its serialized state are synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer at utformingsoverflaten og den serialiserte tilstanden er synkronisert.

trans-unit.source: The actual implementation of this method is forwarded to the designer loader associated with design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den faktiske implementeringen av denne metoden videresendes til designer laster knyttet til utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The designer loader may choose to defer changes until Flush is called, or it may choose to keep the serialized data up to date with all user changes.
trans-unit.target: Designer-laster kan velge å utsette endringene til tømming kalles, eller den kan velge å beholde serialiserte dataene oppdatert med alle brukerendringer.

trans-unit.source: The Flush method ensures that regardless of the model the designer loader chooses to use, the serialized state is synchronized with the actual design surface.
trans-unit.target: Metoden tømming sikrer at uavhengig av modellen designer-laster velger å bruke tilstanden serialiserte synkroniseres med den faktiske utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a call is made to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Flush*> method of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et kall til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Flush*>-metoden til <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Flush*>

trans-unit.source: The designer loader is flushed first, and then the Flushed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Designer-laster tømmes først, og deretter Flushed denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a service from the service container.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tjeneste fra beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The GetService method retrieves a service in the design surface’s service container.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetService henter en tjeneste i den utformingsoverflaten beholderen.

trans-unit.source: In addition, this will forward to any service provider that was given to the design surface at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Dette videresender i tillegg til en leverandør som ble gitt til utformingsoverflaten under bygging.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags service for å hente.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, serviceType, or if the service does not exist in the service container.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer eller er en avledet type, serviceType , eller Hvis tjenesten ikke finnes i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the design surface is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om utformingsoverflaten som er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the design surface is currently loaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utformingsoverflaten som er lastet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the designer load has completed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når designer belastningen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The Loaded event is raised for successful loads as well as unsuccessful ones.
trans-unit.target: Laste inn hendelsen starter for vellykket laster som mislykkede installasjoner.

trans-unit.source: If code in this event handler throws an exception, the designer is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koden i denne hendelsesbehandlingen oppstår det et unntak, er designer fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs> object can be used to determine if loading succeeded, and it can also provide a list of errors that occurred during the load.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs>objektet kan brukes til å finne ut om innlasting av vellykket, og den kan også angi en liste over feil som oppstod under innlastingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Errors can occur for successful loads as well, provided that the serialization system can tolerate errors.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan det oppstå feil for vellykket laster samt, forutsatt at systemet serialisering kan godta feil.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of loading errors or a void collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av innlasting av feil eller en ugyldig samling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of loading errors.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>laste inn feil.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the designer is about to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når designer skal lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loading"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loading"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Unloaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Unloaded"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Unloading"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Unloading"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ViewActivated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.ViewActivated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the service container.
trans-unit.target: Henter beholderen.

trans-unit.source: At construction time, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> adds default services into this service container.
trans-unit.target: Under bygging <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>legger til standard services i denne beholderen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: You can leave the default services in their present state, or you can remove them and replace them with your own.
trans-unit.target: Du kan forlate tjenestene som standard i den gjeldende tilstanden, eller du kan fjerne dem og erstatte dem med din egen.

trans-unit.source: The default services are all demand-created, so there is no loss in performance for adding them at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Standardtjenester er alle behov opprettede, slik at det er ingen datatap ytelse for å legge dem under bygging.

trans-unit.source: The service container that provides all services to designers contained within the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen som gir alle tjenester til utviklere innenfor utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en designeren er ferdig utlasting av.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en designer skal til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: When a designer unloads, the entire state for that designer is destroyed, including the designer’s view.
trans-unit.target: Når en designer laster ut, ødelagt hele tilstanden for at designer inkludert i designer-visningen.

trans-unit.source: The view should be unparented at this time.
trans-unit.target: Visningen må være uten overordning nå.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the view for the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter visningen for roten designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> method must be called beforehand to start the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>metoden må kalles på forhånd systemfeilkoden innlasting.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to return a view before the designer loader finishes loading because the root designer, which supplies the view, is the first object created by the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å returnere en visning før designer-laster er ferdig med å laste inn fordi root-designeren som leverer visningen, er det første objektet som er opprettet av designer-laster.

trans-unit.source: If a view is unavailable, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A> raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en visning som er tilgjengelig, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>viser et unntak.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.BeginLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: The notion of a view technology is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger for en visning teknologi er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: But, it remains in the interfaces for root designers for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Men det blir værende i grensesnittene for roten utviklere for bakoverkompatibilitet.

trans-unit.source: Its use is hidden from anyone using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk skjules alle som bruker <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: The View property hides view technologies by passing the supported technologies back into the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen visningen skjuler se teknologier ved å sende støttes teknologiene tilbake til roten designer.

trans-unit.source: The view for the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Vis for roten designer.

trans-unit.source: The design surface is not loading, the designer loader has not yet created a root designer, or the design surface finished the load, but failed.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsoverflaten ble ikke lastet, designer-laster ennå opprettet ikke en Rotdesigner eller utformingsoverflaten fullført belastningen, men mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: More information may available in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: Vil ha mer informasjon, kan tilgjengelig i <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: The designer loaded, but it does not offer a view compatible with this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designer er lastet inn, men det tilbyr ikke en visning som er kompatibel med utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> attached to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate*> method has been called on <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate*>har blitt kalt på <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate*>

trans-unit.source: If you want to support the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate%2A> method, your event handler should activate the window for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ønsker å støtte den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate%2A>metoden hendelsesbehandlingen bør aktivere vinduet for utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
